document.topic_text: Rio Olympics - Closing day round-up Updated / Aug. 22, 2016 07:43 Gary O'Donovan was the Irish flag bearer for the closing ceremony Paul Pollock delivered a strong second-half display to lead the Irish challenge home in 32nd place in the Olympic marathon in Rio de Janeiro, while Kenya's Eliud Kipchoge won gold. The indomitable United States stormed to a third straight basketball gold , swatting aside Serbia in the last event of the Rio Olympics. The volleyball and handball finals also took place with Brazil and Denmark claiming gold respectively. The closing ceremony took place at the Maracana , with plenty of spectacular and colourful images on view as something like 11,400 athletes danced in the Rio rain. View Comments ↓
